none: media/user/SCRAPE/test/2011-12-odz-manouk/extracted/odz manouk/04 I Will Crush To Marrow This Crow Of Ill

Originally ripped by Terminal Escape, posted on December 27, 2011 Description from Terminal Escape:
Even more haunting black metal from the circle of Southern California madmen that call themselves Black Twilight. While I still leave discussions on the subtle nuances of the genre (and this crop of incestuous bands) to the experts, this is some of my favorite stuff from a very prolific group of outcasts. Once again on the Crepusculo Negro label, the sound wraps you like a shroud...tuck in. ODZ MANOUK
//1.bp.blogspot.com/-Gam_NIXIquI/Tu7WwMSWYAI/AAAAAAAACKE/V0bSejeO6y4/s1600/Odz+Manouk+cover+copy.jpg http://crepusculonegro.blogspot.com/
